channel.title: Ultimate compiler guide (maybe no more questions)
channel.description:
OK GUYS if anyone has a compiler problem simply right click your compiler and hit edit, replace the code with the code below once you have done that, go to your startmenu and click search. when window pops up search for "javac" once you find the javac.exe right click it and click propertys you will get a box that pops up and on that you will find an area that reads "path" now highlite the path it will look somthing like this
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
now highlight that and hit ctrl and c to copy it. then go back to the compiler code you edited earlier find the spot that says this
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin/javac.exe" *.java -nowarn *.java
now replace the
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
with the code you just copied, make sure you leave the '/javac.exe"*.java -nowarn*.java' in the code or it wont work if this is helpful to you please dont leach... leave feedback
Burnout
[code]@echo off COLOR F0 Title Compiler echo ******************************************************************************* echo * Compile Complete by Burnout * echo * * echo * specially created for NOOBS!!!!!!!!!!!!! * echo * * echo ******************************************************************************* echo Checking Java version... echo.
:checkjava echo 06 if exist "C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_03/bin/javac.exe" goto java6
:java6 echo. echo compiling... echo java version: 1.6.0_03 echo. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin/javac.exe" *.java -nowarn *.java goto end
:end echo. echo Complete! echo. set recomp= set /p recomp= press enter to close goto close
:close echo. echo closing compiler... [/code]

item.title: Ultimate compiler guide (maybe no more questions)
item.dc:creator: @burnout burnout
item.description:
@burnout wrote:

if you cant find that file then you dont have java jdk–(development kit) you have java jre–(runtime enviroment)
i would suggest going to sun.java.com and downloading jdk or you will have no luck

and i have the 04 update but it saved as 03 fo some reason in my files and even so you didnt follow my instructions if you had you would know that you find what version u have instead of guessing

Read full topic

item.description:
@hot_server wrote:

[code]*******************************************************************************

  •                     Compile Complete by Burnout                      *

  •                                                                         *

  •                 specially created for NOOBS!!!!!!!!!!!!!                *

  •                                                                         *

Checking Java version…

06

compiling…
java version: 1.6.0_04

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options

Complete!

ress enter to close[/code]
lol Sorry dude i tried it for the new version… still the same error…

Thankyou for trying though :o

item.title: Ultimate compiler guide (maybe no more questions)
item.dc:creator: @burnout burnout
item.description:
@burnout wrote:

OK GUYS if anyone has a compiler problem simply right click your compiler and hit edit, replace the code with the code below once you have done that, go to your startmenu and click search. when window pops up search for “javac” once you find the javac.exe right click it and click propertys you will get a box that pops up and on that you will find an area that reads “path” now highlite the path it will look somthing like this

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin

now highlight that and hit ctrl and c to copy it. then go back to the compiler code you edited earlier
find the spot that says this

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin/javac.exe" *.java -nowarn *.java

now replace the

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin

with the code you just copied, make sure you leave the ‘/javac.exe".java -nowarn.java’ in the code or it wont work if this is helpful to you please dont leach… leave feedback

Burnout

[code]@echo off
COLOR F0
Title Compiler
echo *******************************************************************************
echo * Compile Complete by Burnout *
echo * *
echo * specially created for NOOBS!!! *
echo * *
echo *******************************************************************************
echo Checking Java version…
echo.

:checkjava
echo 06
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_03/bin/javac.exe” goto java6

:java6
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.6.0_03
echo.
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:end
echo.
echo Complete!
echo.
set recomp=
set /p recomp= press enter to close
goto close

:close
echo.
echo closing compiler…
[/code]

Read full topic
